# summarize.etable { #pyfixest.summarize.etable }

`summarize.etable(models, digits=3, type='md')`

Create an esttab-like table from a list of models.

## Parameters

| Name     | Type   | Description                                                                                                           | Default    |
|----------|--------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| `models` | list   | A list of models of type Feols, Feiv, Fepois.                                                                         | _required_ |
| `digits` | int    | Number of digits to round to.                                                                                         | `3`        |
| `type`   | str    | Type of output. Options are "df" for pandas DataFrame, "md" for markdown, or "tex" for LaTeX table. Defaults to "md". | `'md'`     |

## Returns

| Type      | Description                                              |
|-----------|----------------------------------------------------------|
| DataFrame | A regression table with estimates and model information. |
